gods.name: The Ash Bearer
gods.primaryPhrase: You chose to carry what others leave behind. The weight will teach you whether that was courage or pride.
gods.secondaryPhrase: You feel the fire, but you have not yet decided if you will burn.

gods.name: The Iron Judge
gods.primaryPhrase: You draw the line where others hesitate. Do not confuse resolve with blindness.
gods.secondaryPhrase: Order watches from the edge of your choices. It will remember what you discarded.

gods.name: The Watcher of Echoes
gods.primaryPhrase: You chose to witness what cannot be undone. Memory is the only justice you trust.
gods.secondaryPhrase: Something in you still listens. That silence will cost you more than you expect.

gods.name: The Archivist of the Void
gods.primaryPhrase: You chose distance. The world will test whether your clarity survives what you refuse to touch.
gods.secondaryPhrase: You stepped back, but your shadow did not. It still reaches toward what you abandoned.
